basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Enterococcus faecalis JCM 5803 (MIC=813 nM), Enterococcus faecalis OU510 (MIC=813 nM), E. faecium TUA 1344L (MIC=813 nM), Enterococcus hirae ATCC 10541 (MIC=406 nM), Lactobacillus plantarum ATCC 14917 (MIC=813 nM), Lactobacillus sakeii ssp.sakei JCM 1157 (MIC=102 nM), Bacillus circulans JCM 2504 (MIC=3250 nM), Bacillus coagulans JCM 2257 (MIC=3250 nM), Bacillus subtilis JCM 1465 (MIC=3250 nM), Listeria innocua ATCC 33090 (MIC=3250 nM).
